result.arabic_text: لَّا يَمۡلِكُونَ ٱلشَّفَٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ عَهۡدٗا
result.translation: 87. Ama koros Shafaaqatta numuh abtam maduddaay, keenih tet abtam matan, kinnih immay cagalah Shafaaqatta abtu duddam Racmaan kinni Rabbih xaqul woo xagana haysite шага kinni (moominiin kinnuk).
